sentences.en: Crowds gathered in the vicinity of Trafalgar Square.
sentences.cn: 成群结队的人聚集在特拉法尔加广场周围。

sentences.en: He did change a few places in the vicinity of Peking.
sentences.cn: 他确实使北京周围的一些地方变了样.

sentences.en: He is in the vicinity of fifty.
He spent rest of his life ( unmarried ) in vicinity of Concord.
sentences.cn: 他终身未娶,后来一直住在康考德附近.

sentences.en: It was a removal from the vicinity of Norland beyond her wishes.
sentences.cn: 从诺兰德地区迁走不是她的愿望.

sentences.en: Only a handful had returned to work in the immediate vicinity.
sentences.cn: 仅有几个人回到临近地区工作。

sentences.en: The assumption of horizontal flow in the vicinity of the drains fails.
sentences.cn: 在排水管附近水平流动的假设不成立.

sentences.en: The cost of the car is in the vicinity of 10,000 dollars.
The police roadblocks are still in place and the immediate vicinity of the house remains cordoned off.
sentences.cn: 警察设置的路障还在，房子四周仍然用警戒线隔离着。

sentences.en: The stolen car was found in the vicinity of the station.
sentences.cn: 被盗汽车在车站附近被发现。

sentences.en: There are green and lush vegetable plots [ beds ] in our vicinity.
sentences.cn: 我们住所周围一片绿油油的 菜地.

sentences.en: There used to be a mill in the vicinity.
There were a hundred or so hotels in the vicinity of the railway station.
sentences.cn: 在火车站附近大约有100家旅馆。

sentences.en: There were a hundred or so hotels in the vicinity of the station.
sentences.cn: 在车站附近有大约一百家左右的旅馆。

sentences.en: There's a factory in the vicinity of the school.
They had covered 70 li and reached the vicinity of the fighting.
sentences.cn: 他们赶了70里,来到了火线附近.

sentences.en: They sense soil moisture in the immediate vicinity of the cup.
sentences.cn: 他们能对直接接近林子的土壤水分作出感应.

sentences.en: This store is the biggest in the vicinity.
sentences.cn: 这个商店算是附近最大的了.

trans.tran_cn: 附近，邻近，附近地区，大约的程度或者数量，〈罕〉近亲
trans.tran_en: in the area around a particular place
